name: SCNBox
desc: A six-sided polyhedron geometry whose faces are all rectangles, optionally with rounded edges and corners.

items.name: init(width: CGFloat, height: CGFloat, length: CGFloat, chamferRadius: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a box geometry with the specified width, height, length, and chamfer radius.

items.name: var width: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the box along its x-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var height: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the box along its y-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var length: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the box along its z-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var widthSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in each face of the box along its x-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var heightSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in each face of the box along its y-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var lengthSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in each face of the box along its z-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var chamferRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of curvature for the edges and corners of the box. Animatable.

items.name: var chamferSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of line segments used to create each rounded edge of the box. Animatable.
